text:
Two Sigma Open Source - http://BeakerNotebook.com, http://TwoSigma.com - NYC

The Beaker team develops a web UI for statistical modeling, data analysis, and visualization. Beaker is open source, based on a modern Angular/Bootstrap architecture, and most of the work is done on Github on the platform of your choice making for a comfortable and high-velocity developer experience.

We are looking for a front-end engineer to lead implementation of taking this complex application to 2.0, including performance optimization, UX design, and collaborative realtime editing, and our Electron version. We are hiring full-stack as well.

Contact: spot@draves.org
